title: background_opacity doesn't work on M1 macOS / Apple Silicon
body:
`background_opacity` has no effect on M1 macOS. Alacritty is always opaque.

### System

OS: macOS 11.5.1 Big Sur
Version: alacritty 0.10.0-dev (62a1fad5)

### Config

```
# Background opacity
#
# Window opacity as a floating point number from `0.0` to `1.0`.
# The value `0.0` is completely transparent and `1.0` is opaque.
background_opacity: 0.82
```
